entry.summary: A new idea has been posted on the Bitcointalk forum, titled "somewhat blue-skies idea" and may be of interest to readers curious about new concepts related to Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. The post includes a link to the forum thread where the idea is discussed in more detail. However, the author does not provide any further information about the content of the thread or the idea itself, leaving it unclear what the topic of discussion is or how it relates to Bitcoin or cryptocurrency. Interested individuals can follow the provided link to the active Bitcointalk forum thread to gain a better understanding of the concept. Multiple users contribute their thoughts and opinions on the idea in the forum thread.
